title: Khuubala Chisang'ii
description: Chisang'ii choosi chili nende buulesia. Bala choosi nechicha khuunywa kameechi.
author: Raphael Wanyonyi

title: Intsilihaasa Iy'Omwoolesi We Bubuukhi
description: A young hunter follows the lead of a honeyguide bird to a bees' hive full of ripe honey. Instead of rewarding the bird with a share of the honey, he chases it away. The next time the young man tries to find honey, the bird gets his revenge!
author: Cornelius Wekunya

title: Mimi ni Moto!
description: Moto unaeleza hadithi yake mwenyewe. Je,  moto una faida na madhara gani?
author: Brigid Simiyu

title: Iphenyane likaCwengile
description: Sara is helping people and animals across the river in her canoe,  but the elephant wants to cross,  too!
author: Sebolelo  Mokapela

title: Mtumbwi wa Sarai
description: Sarai anawasaidia watu na wanyama kuvuka mto kwa kutumia mtumbwi wake,  lakini tembo,  vilevile,  anataka kuvuka!
author: Ursula  Nafula

title: Ohubala Ebisolo
description: Ensolo zonna enyoonta eziruma. Zibale nga zigenda okunywa amazzi.
author: Robert Ssebukyu

title: Olufumo  olw'omuliro
description: Omulilo gweyogerera olufumo lwagwo. (luno luva mumutendera ogusooka mubitabo ebyenfumo kumayengo gano ag'omutimbagano ogwetebwa,  "omulilo").
author: Isaac Mapiti

title: Omulagiriri W'aŋali Omudungere N'Omwegalulo Gugwe
description: A young hunter follows a honey-guide bird to a bees' hive full of ripe honey. Instead of rewarding the bird with a share of the honey, he chases it away. The next time the young man tries to find honey, the bird gets its revenge!
author: Bukheye Mulongo Christopher

title: Aria Ozoo Edepi Ri
description: Once long ago there lived a beautiful bird deep in the forest, a bird that made the rain fall. But people no longer believed in this bird, and stopped taking care of it. There was a terrible drought in the land, until one little girl remembering her grandmother, went into the forest to find the rain bird and give it food to eat. The drought broke, but no one believed that it was because of the rain bird. It took the near death of the girls' father to bring the people to their senses.
author: Doris Maandebo

title: Toidha Kundeka
description: Wandhovu ayenda kusala mwiga. Aye mu kaato kano akatono kati,  Saala anaakola atya?
author: Cornelius Wambi Gulere

title: Okubala Ebisolo
description: Ni hujiiye ohwemera hubala ebyayo ebiba ni bijiiye ohunywa amaaji aŋa hujinywehesa.
author: Gershom Hirome

title: Esie no Muliro
description: Omuliro kwabola ulukano lwayo. Esie no Muliro.
author: Christine  Wanzetse

title: A Careless Man
description: A very careless man didn't store food properly, so his family had nothing to eat.
author: Candiru Enzikuru Mary

title: Okubala Ebisolo
description: Ebisolo byonabyona bili nhonta. Bibale nga bwe bija okunhwa amaadhi.
author: Cornelius Wambi Gulere

title: Die Reënvoël
description: Droogte tref 'n klein dorpie omdat die inwoners die reenmaker voel ignoreer. Kan Ketti,  'n jong meisie,  haar ouma se wysheid gebruik om die situasie te red?
author: Nal'ibali

title: Ehokololo lomundilo
description: Ehokololo lomundilo: Omundilo ta u li tange.
author: Nelly  Ndafyaalako

title: Lacoo Ma Caa
description: Lacoo moo ma caa adada pe ogwoko cam ma ber,  ci jo ot ne gi obedo pe ki gin me acama.
author: Maurice Lamony

title: Bunkɔbri Kaaligu
description: Ɲɔni ni wɔbgu n ni nyu koom?
author: Midzira Charles

title: Okahokololo komulilo
description: Omulilo tagu popi ehokololo lyago gwene.
author: Hamukoto  Efraim

title: Die Reënmaker Voel
description: Droogte tref 'n klein dorpie omdat die inwoners die reenmaker voel ignoreer. Kan Ketti,  'n jong meisie,  haar ouma se wysheid gebruik om die situasie te red?
author: African Storybook

title: Nane Edianlɛ
description: Nzuhɔne ɛlɛku nane ne mɔɔ amuala. Tia bɛ kɛ bɛkɔ banlo nzule la.
author: Susana Ackah (OLE Ghana)

title: Die Reënvoël
description: Droogte tref 'n klein dorpie omdat die inwoners die reenmaker voel ignoreer. Kan Ketti,  'n jong meisie,  haar ouma se wysheid gebruik om die situasie te red?
author: Nal'ibali

title: Otjihambarere tja Muriro
description: Omuriro mauhungire otjihambarere tjayo omuni.
author: Auhe  Tjaveondja

title: Jadit ma Jaswa
description: Jadit moku ma jaswa obedo gwoku ngo cham maber,  uketho jupare obedo pe ku piny mira chama.
author: Catherine  Amia

title: Murume asina kurongeka
description: Murume asina kurongeka akatadza kuchengeta zvokudya zvakanaka,  nokudaro mhuri yake yakava nzara.
author: Fiona Farisai Masinga

title: Die Reenmaker Voel
description: Droogte tref 'n klein dorpie omdat die inwoners die reenmaker voel ignoreer. Kan Ketti,  'n jong meisie,  haar ouma se wysheid gebruik om die situasie te red?
author: Mia Niebuhr

title: Okhubala Tsisolo
description: Lukano lwekhubala.
author: Khabukoshe ASb Team

title: Esanseko lyoMundiro
description: Mundiro tagu sanseke esanseko lyago. (Eli erunduruko koNtambo 1 zobuke zomasanseko pepanunongodi zetumburo "Mundiro").
author: Djaupyu  Siteketa

title: The Rain Bird
description: There lived a beautiful bird deep in the forest,  a bird that made the rain fall.
author: Nal'ibali

title: Da a Awia Kɔeɛ
description: Da koro bi awia kɔeɛ. Ɔkɔeɛ no nnoɔma hyɛɛ aseɛ sesaeɛ.
author: Agnes Asamoah-Duodu (OLE Ghana)

title: Mutum Maras Kula
description: Wani mutum wanda bai damu da ya adana abinci sosai ba. Sakamakon haka iyalinsa su da abincin da za su ci.
author: Muhammad Umar

title: Okhubala Tsisolo
description: Tsisolo tsiosi tsiri nende obwalashe. Tsibale netsitsia okhunywa amatsi.
author: Peter Wanga

title: Going West for Decades on Route 66
L'Oiseau De Pluie
description: Un oiseau magnifique vivait au cœur de la forêt, un oiseau qui faisait tomber la pluie. Mais les gens ne croyaient plus à cet oiseau, et ils cessèrent de prendre soin de lui. Une terrible sécheresse s'abattit alors sur le pays, jusqu'à ce qu'une petite fille aille dans la forêt retrouver l'oiseau de pluie et lui offre de la nourriture. La sécheresse prit fin, mais les gens ne voulurent toujours pas croire à l'oiseau de pluie.
author: Nathalie Hecker

title: Letsatsi La Likela
description: Ka letsatsi le leng letsatsi la likela. Ha a ne a tsamaile,  lintho tsa kala ho fetoha.
author: Khothatso Ranoosi

title: Mutum Mai Sakaci
description: Wani mutum mai sakacin gaske,  ya gaza tanadin abinci dan iyalinsa.
author: Muhammad Umar

title: Oku valula oinamwenyo
description: Oinamwenyo aishe oya fya enota. I valula nee eshi ta yii i ka nwe omeva.
author: Nelly  Ndafyaalako

title: Dreamland
description: wonders of sweet juicy mangoes.

title: Umugabo Utita Kukintu
description: Umugabo Ututa kukintu yananiwe kubika imyaka, n'uko umudyango we Ubura icyokudya.
author: Mutabazi  William Evans

title: Daago Nyeenyungo  Ngo Rakiya
description: Suka debbo oo  mawnii, imo watti sajjaadu mo sirri. Sajjaadu on hisinta Ake gacce, nder mballaga  poolel gooɗom; ɗum fuu,iɗum walla mo to o majju dow bamle ɗen.
author: Plan Niger - Projet NECS - Usaid

title: Okuyalula iinamwenyo
description: Iinamwenyo aihe oya sa enhota. Yiyalula sho tai kanwa omeya.
author: Hamukoto  Efraim

title: Der Regenvogel
description: Tief im Wald lebte ein wunderschöner Vogel,  ein Vogel,  der den Regen machte. Aber als die Leute nicht mehr an den Vogel glaubten,  kümmerten sie sich auch nicht mehr um ihn. Da suchte eine fürchterliche Dürre das Land heim,  bis ein kleines Mädchen in den Wald ging,  um den Regenvogel zu suchen und zu füttern. So endete die Dürre,  aber die Leute wollten immer noch nicht an den Regenvogel glauben.
author: Mirko Plitt

title: Umugabo Wigisambo
description: Umugabo wigisambo niyigeje kubika ibiryo neeza,  noneho urugo rwe nabiryo bari bafite kurya.
author: Noel Abaho

title: Daan Ne O Bunbule An Be A Kɔ
description: Solemer n toar ya bonkob biih n nye faag'n baih saŋ sie ka ba paaged kadem yir. Bonkob biiho nye soŋre yi ninvoasoŋ ne o taab ban soŋre sane ka ba wol ba.
author: J. K. A. Anankor and E. T. Anoeni (OLE Ghana)

title: Okuvara ovinamunjo
description: Ovinamunjo avihe vino njota. Vara otja pumavi kanuua omeva.
author: Auhe  Tjaveondja

title: Intak'emvula
description: Kwilizwe laseGabon,  kwakukhona eyona ntaka ikhethekileyo – intaka eyenza imvula. Kodwa ngelishwa,  abahlali baloo ndawo bayeka ukuyikhathalela lentaka,  yaze nayo yayeka ukwenza imvula. Bayisombula njani loo ngxaki abahlali?
author: Nal'ibali

title: Omusajja Atefirayo
description: Olugero luno lukwata ku musajja eyari tefirayo,  nga tafayo na ku famile ye kye banalya. Soma olugero luno olabe nga werwali.
author: Stellah Nakasango

title: Contando Os Animais
description: Todos os animais estão com sede. Conte os animais conforme estão indo beber água.
author: Translators without Borders

title: Die wildwagter en sy spesiale reservaat
description: 'n Storie oor 'n reservaat waar baba-diere sonder ouers gered word. 'n Spesiale man en sy span versorg die klein diere.
author: Fanie Viljoen

title: forest friends
description: About a boy without a talent and his way of thinking and life

title: Inyoni enisa imvula
description: Kwakukhona inyoni enhle eyayihlala phakathi emahlathini. Lenyoni yayinisa imvula.
author: Nal'ibali

title: Agupi a'dikoruri
description: Agupi azini a'dikoru tu ri te nyaka ta mba kilili kuye,  erima akua afasi nyazaru yo.
author: GUMA DEOGRATIOUS

title: Yikoramavaruro
description: Yikorama nayinye nomurongo ntatu. Kwayi varura apa yina kuka nwa mema.
author: Djaupyu  Siteketa

title: Muchengeti wekireshi yemhuka
description: Runganorwekusvika pakireshi kwevana vumhuka vakanunurwa.
author: Ephraim Mhlanga

title: Aria Ozoo Edepi Ri
description: Àrɨ́á àzɨ́nɨ  ndrâ ndrɨ̀zà rʉ́ cɨ́ jèrè mà alɨ́á ágádǔá 'dálé, àrɨ́á fěpɨ ozǒ nɨ́ 'dɨzʉ́ rɨ̀. 'Bá à'ì kɨ́ nɨ́ dɨ́ ndráa e'yó  àrɨ́á 'dɨ̀ nɨ́ kʉ díká kʉ́ vɨ́nɨ tà nɨ̀ mbazʉ́ jà. Ètú àmbôrʉ́ ngà dɨ́ ndráa ká nɨ̀, kpere zámvá àzɨ́ wereá rʉ̌ nɨ nɨ́ murɨá jèrè aléá'dálé àrɨ́á 'dɨ̀nɨ́ nyaká fèrɨá ká ozoó nga 'dí ndò. Te 'bá mu kɨ́ drìlé e'yó àrɨ́á 'dɨ̀ nɨ gàzʉ́ sɨ̀.
author: Dorothy Fetaru

title: Umuseza  Ukafayo Da
description: Umuseza ukafay da kabika bidio belayi,  katano maka gewe kegali ni chekudia nda.
author: Robina Wanyenze

title: Nonyana Ea Pula
description: Hoo ne ho na le nonyana e ntle e kholo ka hare ho moru. E ne e le nonyana e nag le matla a ho bina ho fihlela pula e na ha batho ba e tlisetsa lijo. Eaba batho ba nka qeto ea hore ba tla tlohela ho e iseta lijo hobane pula ha e tlisoe ke nonyana. Eaba ha ba e tima lijo motse oa bona o otloa ke komello e kholo hoo eileng ea bolaea lijalo ebile e kulisa liphohofolo. Ngoanana ea bitsoang Titi a bitsoang Titi a qala hape ho fepa nonyana hore pula e ne hape.
author: Moeketsi Buku

title: Okubara Ebinyamiiswa
description: Ebinyamiswa byoona byine iriho. Bibare byabanibigyenda kunywa ameizi.
author: Julius Tusiime

title: Omotugi n'enasari yaye
description: Omogano igora ya ogokonya ebirerwa bieching'iti chikoretwa ase enasari ye chitangana. Ebirerwa ebio nigo bikorerwa nomonto obene na abakonyi bande.
author: Gladys Nyachieo

title: As Vozes Dos Animais
description: Augusto está lendo um livro animal. Irene quer ver os animais. Você conhece algum dos animais Augusto e Irene estão lendo sobre?
author: World Education

title: Umusetsa Uhafayo Ta
description: Umusetsa uhafayo ta shabiha biryobulayi ari beshikuka bewe batamba shehulya.
author: namee lillian

title: Keeper and his nursery
description: A story about rescued baby animals arriving at a nursery for orphans. These little animals are nursed and looked after by a special person and his team of helpers.
author: Nina Orange

title: Ŋa Ma Nyalo Kwano Kir Iy Apar?
description: Ŋa ma obedi kere pa ogwange ka Kwac oweyo kom?
author: Athieno Gertrude

title: Keeper and his special nursery
description: A story about rescued baby animals arriving at a nursery for orphans. These little animals are nursed and looked after by a special person and his team of helpers.
author: African Storybook

title: Omusaadha Omulagaadhavu
description: Omusaadha omulagaadhavu tiyakuuma mmere bulungi,  kale abomumaka ge tibaali na mmere ya kulya.
author: Cornelius Wambi Gulere

title: Ndiani anogona kuverenga kusvika ku gumi?
description: Ndiani achave mutongi wemhuka kana Mambo Mbada azorora?
author: Ephraim Mhlanga

title: Omusaadha atafaayo
description: Amaka ag'omusaadha atafaayo galumwa endhala.
author: Charles Eramaga

title: Our Animals
description: A story about rescuing young orphaned animals and caring for them.
author: Ursula Nafula

title: Palo ya Diphologolo
description: Diphologolo di tshwerwe ke lenyora. Di bale jaaka di fetela nokeng go ya go nwa.
author: Batsile Lelliott

title: Keeper Et Son Orphelinat Spécial
description: Une histoire sur la survie de petits animaux qui arrivent à l'orphelinat. Ces petits animaux sont nourris et entretenus par une personne engagée ainsi que son équipe d'assistants.
author: Johanne Jean-maître

title: Go bala diphologolo
description: Diphologolo tsotlhe di nyorilwe. Di bale fa di ya go nwa metsi.
author: Lorato Trok

title: Ning'o orobare goika ikomi?
description: Ning'o orabe omoruoti bweching'iti chiorosana maega yeechui korwa oboruoti?
author: Gladys Nyachieo

title: Omushaija  Atarikweferayo
description: Omushaija atarikweferayo tarabikyire kurungyi eby'okurya,  mbwenu eka ye ekaba etaine ky'okurya kyoona.
author: muhumuza martin

title: A Curse or a Blessing?
description: Was the rain a blessing or a curse?
author: Alfred Esinyen

title: UMgcini nendawo yakhe ekhethekileko
description: Indatjana imayelana nabentwana beenlwana abahlengiweko abafika eentandanini. Iinlwanyana lezi zitlhogonyelwa mumuntu okhethekileko nethimba lakhe.
author: Phephelaphi Mnguni

title: Ingyegh ki anyamev
description: Imyura kôr anyamev. Ôr ingyegh vev er ve lu zan u za man mngerem yô.
author: Terkule Aorabee

title: Who can count to ten?
description: Who will be ruler of the animals after King Leopard steps down?
author: Athieno Gertrude

title: Alheri Ko Annoba?
description: Shin ruwan sama alheri ne ko annoba ga al'umma?
author: Sa'adatu Sani Hanga

title: U vhala phukha
description: Zwipuka zwoṱhe zwo farwa nga ḓora. Zwi vhaleni musi zwi tshi ya u nwa maḓi.
author: Ndivhuho Mutsila

title: Umgcinizilwane nezilwane zakhe
description: Indaba imayelana nezilwane ezisencane ezihlengwe ezimeni eziyingozi ezahlukene zifika ekhaya lezintandane. Lezi zilwane zinakekelwa ziqashelwe ngumgcinizilwane kanye neqembu labasizi bakhe.
author: Pumla Mdontswa

title: Who is the next ruler?
description: Who will be king of the animals after King Leopard dies?
author: African Storybook

title: Ħisbēn L-Ħayewēnēt
description: L-Ħayewēnēt l-koll ɛoṭċēnīn. Iħsibhom w hūma mēcīn biċ yoċrbu l-me.
author: Ramzi Hachani

title: Mûǂamaob tsî ǃûiǃgâs xa
description: ǂōǂōsiba xu ra huiǂuihe ǀgururon ra mûǂams ǃnaga sâuhe (kōǃgâhe) ǃkhaib xa ra ǃgû ǂhôas ge nēsa ǀôaisa khoen xa ra mûǂamhese.
author: Mattheus  Goraseb

title: Gyara ko Ɓarna
description: Bahaushe kan ce,  damina uwar aibarka. Haka kuma yakan ce,  ruwa ya yi barna. Shin ruwa gyara yake ko barna?
author: Rabiatu Ahmad

title: Ngubani ongabala afike eshumini?
description: Ngubani ozoba ngumphathi wezilwane emva kokuthi ingwe seyehlile esihlalweni?
author: Pumla Mdontswa

title: Umucheno Changa Umugisha?
description: Yarabazaja ngo "Invura yario umugisha changa umucheno?"
author: Noel Abaho

title: Kíka Àwọn Ẹranko
description: Òùngbẹ ń gbẹ àwọn ẹranko. Kà wọ́n bí wọ́n ti ń lọ mu omi.
author: Ṣẹ́gun Ṣóẹ̀tán

title: Mwii wa nyamũ na kyũũ kyake
description: Ĩĩ nĩ ngewa ya twana tũnini twa nyamũ tũkwetwe kyũũnĩ kya nyamũ ndiwa. Tũnyamũ tũũ tũsũvĩawa nĩ mũndũ wa mwanya na kĩkundi kyake kya atetheesya.
author: Anna Kula

title: Nũũ ũtonya kũtala nginya ĩkũmi?
description: Nũũ ũla esumbĩka nyamũ ĩtina wa mũsumbĩ Ngo kũtia kĩvĩla?
author: Anna Kula

title: Álụ́ma Ꞌbã Ádrị́pị Ĩmbíráŋá Ũvú Rĩ
description: Álụ́ma ꞌbã ádrị́pị ĩmbíráŋá ũvú rĩ.
author: Delu Barnabas

title: Mlinzi na chekechea yake
description: Hadithi ya jinsi wanyama wachanga tofauti walivyookolewa na kupelekwa kataika makao maalumu walikotunzwa.
author: Ursula Nafula

title: Ilam Amotoko Winyo
description: Koudo koot nono tiye Winyo Amotoko Ilam?
author: Agnes Kabonesa

title: Ni nani atakuwa mfalme?
description: Ni nani atakuwa mfalme wa wanyama baada ya Mfalme Chui kufa?
author: Ursula Nafula

title: Shisirani Namwe Ihabi?
description: Abe ifula ihabi namwe namwe shisirani? Babandu lulala bambasa ifula ihabi namwe shisirani khubulamu bwomundu.
author: Namee Lillian

title: Mobateli na basali nabisika ya bokengeli
description: Lisakoli ya lelo ezali ya mobateli na basali naye,  bazali kopesa bongengele elamu na ba niama bakufela ba boti.
author: Dorine Kamin

title: الأخ الصغير الكسول
description: أنا أغسل الصحون؟ لماذا أنا أعمل بجد. بينما أخي مشغول باللعب!
author: Heba Tesheh

title: Nani atahesabu mpaka kumi?
description: Nani atakuwa mfalme wa wanyama baada ya Mfalme Chui kustaafu?
author: Brigid Simiyu

title: Amaadhi Kikolimo oba Mukisa?
description: Olugero luno lubuuza oba amaadhi ga mukisa oba kikolimo?
author: Lilian  Lyavaala

title: Lazy little brother
description: Big brother gets very grumpy with his little brother who spends his whole time playing while the elder boy does all the household chores.
author: Clare Verbeek

title: Nani akoki kotanga tii na zomi?
description: Nani akokamba baniama soki Mokonzi Nkoyi atiki?
author: Theresa  Nyemba

title: Omubayi nende liitaala lyewe
description: Luukano lwo chisaang'i chindoro chirerwa mwiitala lya buuyeti. Chisaang'i chindoro chilindwa buulayi nende omwaayi ne baayeti beewe.
author: Raphael Wanyonyi

title: Umnakwethu omncinci olivila
description: Kutheni mna ndisebenza kangaka. Kodwa umnakwethu edlala ngalo lonke ixesha?
author: Lunathi Ntunzi

title: Omucheeno Oba Omugyisha
description: Enjura ekaba eri omugyisha oba omucheeno?
author: muhumuza martin

title: Omulisya N'Ekiraalokye Ekyenjawulo
description: Olugero olukwata oku bisolo ebitobito ebibalamirye ebyatuukanga oku kiraalo nga bibulaku omawaawe. Obusolo bunu bwabbaireku omuntu owenjaulo n'etiimuye eyabayambi.
author: Mugalya Moses

title: A Dancer's Tale: The Story of Phyllis Spira
description: This is the story of the life of Phyliis Spira,  from the time she was a young aspiring dancer,  to her world travels,  and finally her marriage and creation of dance schools in South Africa.
author: Samantha Cutler

title: Mukulembeze ki anairaku?
description: Kyabazinga ki anairaku nga kyabazinga Mpala aviireku?
author: Kyambogo  University

title: Ebisolo byaisu
description: Olufumo lukwatagana na kununula ebisolo ebimulekwa ebitobito n'okubirabirira.
author: Kyambogo  University

title: Kamwanayia Kaanu
description: In this story the big brother gets very grumpy with his little brother who spends his whole time playing while he is doing all the chores.
author: Anna Kula

title: Wandayase Omukara
description: Big brother gets very grumpy with his little brother who spends his whole time playing while the elder boy does all the household chores.
author: Ursula Nafula

title: Ne wina ounyala okhubala okhula ekhumi?
description: Omwami ingwe niyakharula khushisala shiobwami,  oulaba omuruchi we tsisolo ne wina?
author: Peter Wanga

title: Olugero lwo omukini Fillis Spira
description: Luno nolugero lwo omukini Fillis Spira,  okuva nga akali omuvubuka eyegomba okuba omukini, nhi bweyatambula ensi yona yona,  okukomenkereza nobufumbo bwe na amasomero ga abakini geyatandikagho mu South Africa.
author: Martha Tibaga R

title: Omuhuumi N'Olusito Olukugu
description: Olugero lw'obusolo obuŋere niwoola mu Lusito lw'obufuubbbi. Obusolo buno bujanjabibwa n'ohulabirirwa n'omutu owenjawulo ko netiimu y'abayeedi.
author: Gershom Hirome

title: A Deficiência Não É Uma Incapacidade
description: Uma pessoa com uma deficiência pode não conseguir fazer algumas coisas devido a essa deficiência, mas as pessoas com deficiências podem ter muitas outras capacidades e talentos, tal como toda a gente.
author: Translators without Borders

title: Mukuza ne Ikuumiro Lye

description: Baafuubi Mukhwana ni Namono baabirisibwa buubi naabi ni khootsa waabwe, shaakila baatitukha baatsya khuumenya mu lifuluma. Ne baawulilakho khaale bari iliwo kamasiilikhe mu ngoongo tsitsiili aambi ni lifuluma lyaabwe, shaakila babaana bano baaba nga betsiliilisa naabi. Nga Mukhwana arura ibulafu khuutsya khuweentsa sha khulya, Namono niye aaramatsaka mwifuluma, nga aloondelela shiilakilo she khuulekha khuuteekha inyama yoosi ta, lwekhuuba abe kamasiilikhe kanyala keetsa nga kawunyilisa inyama. Ne Namono manya kane awuliilise byeesi Mukhwana aloma?

title: Demane Ka Demazane
description: Eboliar amae kech ng'ichenin keng lu erae ng'ikokiok Demane ka Demazane na kakneni amatarosi kesi anawi ayakasi akiboi anagum. Eirasi kesi atamar eya ng'ikanyim nagumon a ng'imor, na kaneni achamakina ng'ide  echoikinito. Nacha eyakaria Demane asakar akimuj, edong'ene Demazane nagum na kaneni alimokinitae atamar ny'idorok airing kotere eminasi ng'ikanyim airing. Epedori Demazane akiirar ng'akiro alokatokeng a?

title: Omwana Gwe Njovu Ogujagu Jagu

Omwan gw'Enjovu gono gwayagala nga nnyo okumanya ebyakwatanga ku buli kintu kyona. Olw'okwagala okumanya ebintu ebye njawulo kunsolo endala zona, yazibuuza nga ebibuzo ebyenjawulo nga kwogase n'okwagala okumanya kiki Ggonya kyezaaryanga ekyeggulo.  Era kya muwaliriza okugenda ku mugga ekiro okuzuula kiki Ggonya kye zirya ekyeggulo. Era bwe yali eyo, omwana gw'Enjovu guno negwa mu matwale ga Ggonya,era ensisinkana eyo yali nyuvu nnyo.

title: Imbwa Numuselebaba
description: Umwigisha yakoze imbozi mukanya ke nabana bi kilasi yagatandatu.

title: Wanyama wapata miguu
description: Maguru aliamua kuwapatia wanyama miguu ili watembee kwa furaha kama watu.

title: Èwámvá Òlúkùlúá Be Rɨ̀
description: Ndráa drɨ̀ò rɨ̀sɨ̌, èwá yɨ mà òmvʉ ndráa àlíá kʉ́dʉ̀ kʉ́dʉ̀, te kà ndráa adrɨ Èwámvá àzɨ́ òlúkùèlúá be àlʉ nɨ sɨ̀ kʉʉ́, èwá yɨ drɨ́á té 'dò  òmvʉ be àlí àlí. Èwámvá 'dɨ̀ mà òlúkùlúá ndrá e'yó drɨ́á sɨ̀ tʉ̀. Èrɨ ndráa zitá ozɨ́ ànyàpá èrɨ nɨ́ drì fuzʉ́ yɨ be 'dɨ̀yɨ mà tiá, lè e'yó kárákàràú ònǐ, kpèrè lè e'yó ònǐ nyaká íyíó nɨ́ nyá òndrésɨ̀ rɨ̀ mà drìá ɨ̀ndɨ̀. Gǎgǎ zi èrɨ́ muzʉ́ nyaká òndrésɨ̀ rɨ̀ mà ètɨ́ òndàzʉ́ yí àra mà alɨ́á. Kà mú cá yí àra mà alɨ́á 'boó, Èwámvá fu drì Éyíó be rá. Drìfuzà 'dɨ̀ nga dɨ́ ndrɨ̌ fudrì cɨ́.
author: Alice Ojobiru

title: Demane Ka Demazane
description: Eboliar amae kech ng'ichenin keng lu erae ng'ikokiok Demane ka Demazane na kakneni amatarosi kesi anawi ayakasi akiboi anagum. Eirasi kesi atamar eya ng'ikanyim nagumon a ng'imor, na kaneni achamakina ng'ide  echoikinito. Nacha eyakaria Demane asakar akimuj, edong'ene Demazane nagum na kaneni alimokinitae atamar ny'idorok airing kotere eminasi ng'ikanyim airing. Epedori Demazane akiirar ng'akiro alokatokeng a?
author: Dennis Lokitare

title: Embwa ne' ekinya
description: Omushomesa akakola embozi eya obwile bwe omu kyamukaga.
author: Raymond Mugisha

title: A father's lesson
description: What do you think of the advice from Abula's father? (This story was created at a story development workshop at Ras Abebe library in Debre Birhan in May 2018).
author: Abraham  Bereket

title: Wanatsofu Umwana Urebareba
description: Aabawo imbuka isi tsi tsofu tsaba nikamoolu kamafwiti nalundi kamabambali, ne syekhabi indayi iya wanatsofu umwana umureebireebi, mu khwakamisa nga tsili ni kimikhono kimileeyi kitsiyeeta.Aaba arebareba   khubuli sindu.Aarebatsaka tsisolo tsitsindi tsesi aakananatsaka  birebo nikhumanya biikali,nga  muuli ni khumanya syesi Koonya alya syehangolobe. Khoolo amupiilisa atsye abone byesi Konya alya angolobe khunyatsa.Ngawolile'yo Wanatsofu  urebareba akaanaana Konya, ne khukhwakaanana kwabwe kwaba khukhwiyangisa!
author: Cornelius Wekunya

title: Mukhwana Nende Mulongo
description: Abebusi babu Mukhwana nende Mulongo bafwa babalekha okhuikhabira efiakhulia abeene. Balindwa obubi muno nende khotsa wabu kho niberukha batsia khumenya mwibina. Bali nende oburi okhubera bali nibaulira mbu amanani kali nikamenya mufikulu. Mukhwana yarulanga elwanyi okhuyiima na Mulongo yekhalanga mwibina. Mukhwana yabolera omukhana wabu mbu alatekha inyama tawe khulwa amanani kachama isami ye inyama itekhwa. Mulonga alakhola nga abolerwa? Soma olole shiokheleshera Mukhwana nende Mulongo.
author: Catherine Were

title: Esolo Jifuna Amagulu
description: Hamba asalaŋo ohuŋa esolo josijosi amagulu ko jaha nyumirwa ohugenda hy'abaatu.

title: Demane le Demazane
description: Ditshuana,  Demane le Demazane ba hlokofatšwa ke malome wa bona. Gomme ba tšhaba ba ya go dula kua legageng. Ba kwele gore makgema a dula mebotwaneg kgaufsi,  le le legaga,  ka fao ba be ba swanetšwe ke ntšha mahlo dinameng. Ge Dumane a tšwile go ya go nyaka tša go ja,  Dumazane o be a šala ka legageng a bile a laetšwe gore a se apeye nama ka ge makgema a kgona go dupelela monkgo wa nama. Gomme ba o šale morago moo o tšwago gona. Na Dumazane o tla theeletša buti wa gagwe.
author: Maphokane Mapule Mohlamme

title: Esolo Jifuna Amagulu

title: Limane Le Limazane

Ha Limane a ilo tsoma Lijo, o laela Limazane ka matla hore a se phehe nama hobane monkho oat eng o tla bitsa Malimo. Na Limazane o tla mamela?

Néíkilíkuanishóre inkukúni pookí naatûm oméíkilikuanú ajó káínyoo oshî ényá olkínos aitaá endáa e téípa. Néjokí olkúrrûk peê élô aikilikuanishoré olkinós te embatá é olkejú. Óre etií ínê, nétumo olkúóo lé oltómé ó olkinós, néaku etúmô énye énê típat.

Crow urged him to go and find out what the crocodile has for dinner at the river. While there,  curious baby elephant encountered a crocodile and their meeting got very interesting. Hierdie verlaal leer ons dat jy enigeiets kan doen, as jy bereid is om hard te werk vir dit. Dit bewys ook dat om aan die binnekant mooi te wees tel meer as enige iets anders.

Essawa byezatuka ezokudda ewaka, nebagala ogabana enkofu. Omulenzi omu nadduka nebinnyonyi bwombi. Abalenzi bali ababiri nebamugoba nebamujjako ebinnyonyi.

description: Abaatu bomu hyalo basenguhira mu sozi bahaŋona esolo ekambwe ejaali ni jibahabisye. Nga beega ohulya ebibala n'emisi j'emisaala. Ehyaŋwamo nga batandiiha ohwebisya hy'enguge. Ehiseera nj'ehyene jalehera aŋo ohumenya ŋalala.

Die hiëna wat in n mens verander het, het haar en haar tannie gevang en nadat die mense van die dorp hulle gehelp het, het Kalabushe nie meer so baie gepraat nie.
